website_summaries.verdict: While it doesn't do much to distinguish itself from other neckband-style headphones from a design standpoint, the Jabra Halo Smart seems sturdily built, performs very well as a headset for making calls and offers decent sound quality for music if you get a tight seal.
pros: The Jabra Halo Smart is a sturdily built neck-band style headphone that performs very well as a headset for making cell phone calls, offers good battery life, and decent sound for music if you get a tight seal
Neckband vibrates when a call comes in
cons: You may not get a secure, tight seal from any of the included ear tips, which leads to a poor fit and a reduction in sound quality

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone quality -- earbud covers ALWAYS fall off
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these everyday since I purchased them. About 2 months. Pros : - audio quality -battery life is fantastic definitely as advertised -comfort -completly functional as advertised Cons: ( very picky issues ) - The plastic ear buds fall off and I've already lost about 6 of them. I have no idea how to stop this. Sometimes they fall when they hit my hoodie pull strings . - sometimes they rotate on my neck because the band is too wide , but this wideness also makes them more comfortable - sometimes there is static or odd connection, they work 95% of the time no problem though
customer_reviews.author: Some_Technophile

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headset for the price. Excellent audio and crystal clear voice. My only issue is the magnets that hold the ear bulbs are not strong enough to withstand the movement around shirt collars. Overall though this product is top notch especially around the battery life of the product and quality of the device for hearing and speaking to people on calls. They are crystal clear when listening to Music with rich sounds which was unexpected for the price. Definitely a deal for anyone seeking an item like this. I would and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: William M. Haycraft

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but broke after only 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I wear my headphones every morning and afternoon when I bike to work to listen to podcasts. Otherwise I kind of only use them for phone calls at home. Between these activities they live in a drawer with a few pairs of sunglasses. So they really don't get beaten up at all. But now the volume down button isn't responding which of course is not only the volume button, but also rewind. The buttons are also just frankly not obvious enough to feel. They are tiny, especially the volume down. It's just a tiny dash/ minus. I'm trying to see if Jabra will either take them back or replace them. We'll see how they respond. May update after that.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design for a brand leader
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design by a leading brand (at least at one time). I would guess this was an outsourced development product to save time/cost. the design is not-ergonomic or assessed for usability (at least to me). the ear buds are odd..i have had several sets of headphones over 20 ears and these would NOT fit or stay in my ears..i tried all caps and the same effect the ear bud wires are too short and too heavy...the short caused them to hang on your collar and weight helped ensure the earbuds would fall out. the sound was normal...not special..I only used for 1 day and had a 4-5 calls.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Product
customer_reviews.text: I would not ever purchase another Jabra item based upon the issues that I have had with 2 headsets. I purchased this headset and had to return it because it was malfunctioning. It would repeatedly hang up in the middle of calls, not allow me to answer calls from the headset, etc. It acted as though there was a short somewhere. I returned it and received another one and less than six months in the replacement is malfunctioning in the exact same way. This appears to be a shoddy product or I was just lucky enough to get two duds. Either way I plan to return this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for about two weeks......
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through three pair of Jabra's Halo Smart IIs. It's too bad because I find them to be the best balance of sound quality, weight on the neck so it doesn't fall off and down your back, and battery life is excellent. Unfortunately, my first pair shorted out in one ear after the warranty ended, the second pair just decided to stop re-charging one day, and the third kind of fell apart because of the plastic design. If they lowered the price to $19 I'd buy 4 and deal with it. There something wrong with these sadly and customer service at Jabra is horrible, slow, and just too many hoops to get to real help
customer_reviews.author: A.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I really needed some legitimate water proof speakers. I sweat ALL DAY and the last three pairs of headphones have all gotten corroded and shorted out. These headphones were great, easy to use, comfortable and (the way I sweat in South Louisiana) waterproof. The left earpiece quit working so I sent them back but I’m ordering a replacement set because I liked them so much.
customer_reviews.author: SkyFun

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this headset is that it doesn't last. I have purchased 2 of these and they always start to break before the year. One of the earbuds just stopped working and then it just started hanging up my calls all the time. I thought with the first one was because they are "supposed" to be able to twist and be flexible and I figure that messed up with the contacts and wires inside; so with the second one I never twisted and the same problem happened. Waste of money, I'm going for the more expensive high-end headsets and better quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: A-A

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I was fairly pleased with my Jabra headphones, but starting about a week ago, the left speaker started developing static, and today, it went out entirely. I only used these for three months, which is far too short. The ear piece is also poorly designed, and regardless of the plastic insert sizes used, they fall out too easily. I’ve owned many headphones and never had this problem. It’s a design flaw. I noticed many other reviewers had the same problem. I really can’t recommend Jabra headphones because of the above problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Craig Dekker

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I've always held the brand Jabra in high regard so I bought this unit because of the small in ear buds and it was supposed to have a superb microphone. Connecting it to my computer or phone is easy but it's range is horrible. I found there was a lot of "static" and everyone I was talking to said I sounded like I was "far away". All in all, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: My cheaper plantonics work much better
customer_reviews.text: The ear fit on this model is terrible resulting in the ear buds failing out all of the time. My purchase stopped working after one year of light use mainly while doing chores in the house. This is not a good model for people with thicker necks and the back heavy design frequently fell off my shoulders while doing light work. Two stars because the sound and call microphone were excellent if you could get a good seal in your ears (please see my first sentence.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones - unfortunately too fragile
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice headphones - unfortunately they do not seem to be very durable. I've had two pairs. The first pair was working great for me. The one day out of the blue the left earbud quite working. Amazon replaced it under their warrantee. The second pair worked great for about 5 months. Again, out of the blue... one day it would not power on. I really like these - they are comfortable, they work great, the microphone is phenomenal, no one ever said to me "are you on bluetooth?" due to poor call quality. Unfortunately they appear to be exceptionally fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Vanderbeek

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in February, it is now May and this think will no longer pair with my iPhone 8 Plus. Very disappointing. Won't even turn off now or reset. It's like the multi function button is no longer working. Yes I know it was only $29 but I went by all the glowing reviews and having previously owned an LG that lasted for over 2 years. Plus they kept falling off the back of my neck if I wore a shirt with a collar. Crazy. Trying to figure it out is very frustrating. Won't pair with any device I have. It just flashes blue 3 or 4 times and that's it. Think I'm done with Jabra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If there is a hint of defectiveness: Don't give it a chance, Return right away!
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was defective and my experience with Jabra has been terrible ... When I connect to the headset after its turned off, it took several minutes for the audio to work. I still gave it a chance... but after 4 months using the product, now the background static noise has increased and it's unbearable on the other end of the line. This product sucks... I looked up the Jabra Warranty but this product isn't even listed as "in-warranty" ... not sure why Jabra is dropping the ball here. I paid good money for great behind-the-neck headphones... I won't be turning to Jabra next time...
customer_reviews.author: Abdur Rehman

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth headset was purchased because my LG (I paid $99 at the Sprint Store) died slowly. One ear stopped working and then it just died completely. I love this Jabra Halo Smart set. It fits comfortably and is amazing as you can answer your phone by simply separating the earbuds and hang up a call by simply connecting the earbuds. Just awesome. The sound quality is great as well and music and videos sound great. I am going to buy this again for my husband. He will love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I picked two from a bad batch. Maybe their QA is just bad
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware: I purchased a the Jabra Halo and began having problems with it almost immediately; it would not pair and when it did, it would drop. Jabra's support is lacking - after a dozen back-and-forth emails, they determined I must have a defective set. I returned to Amazon and received a replacement. Same deal, but this defective set effectively 'locked up' - dead as a stone. Maybe I picked two from a bad batch. Maybe their QA is just bad. Either way, the support was slow, ill-informed and generally unhelpful
customer_reviews.author: Mark Firmani

customer_reviews.title: Great sound while they work
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great deal until one side stop working properly, if I move the head from side to side, right side stop working, if I move my head by looking down, music goes from play to pause, dont know why. Sadly they work perfect from January 2018 until May 2018, there is no way how to repair this, just buy another one...bad.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good and the charge lasts a very long time. I don't like the the little door to get to the charge input as its a bit difficult to get off and the little cord that keeps it attached gets in the way of the plug. They stay around the next alright, but can slide to either side which is a bit annoying. But overall, I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Bingo

customer_reviews.title: Falls back off Neck
customer_reviews.text: I had them for less than 3 weeks and they kept on falling off. Well I was in Reno for Hot Aug Nights and the fell off and I had no when I realized they were gone I backtracked and they were gone. They sounded great but just would not stay on my neck....Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: C. Binford

customer_reviews.title: Good performance but bad app interface,
customer_reviews.text: The sound and general use is above expected but the app doesn't don't do all it says, doesn't read social media messages from a Samsung note 8 in Android 9 .. the worst thing is that I wrote at least 3 times to Jabra's customer service and I haven't get a response more than a month after my first email Sorry for the bad english
customer_reviews.author: HDLROSA

customer_reviews.title: For 28$ this is a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Very good earbuds for the money. I like the battery life and so called "smart" features. Sound is decent and no distortion on high volume. Mids are well balanced and like that ( since i like Rock all the way) What I don't like is cable- it is not so flexible and it would be nice if you could adjust the lenght (like on Skullcandy inkd ). They are also swet proof which is nice feature,but they dont stay in your ear when running :( aaaand the stock ear silicones are total crap. Overall,i like them. I can live with the shortcmoings and i use them most of the time (i have 3 more pair of Bluetooth earbuds beside Jabra)
customer_reviews.author: Dulexetina

customer_reviews.title: Super uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the most uncomfortable thing you can design. You know that episode in Seinfeld where they designed a couch and ended up using it as a torture device for the CIA? They should throw this in that same group. The plastic has these flex points, which I guess is great for your collar bone. But the part that wraps around your neck is stiff plastic that compresses your corrotid arteries on both sides, no joke I almost blacked out. You can actually feel the anxiety come on in a wave as you put these around your neck, and if you hold them there long enough you might actually pass out.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa Gorodokin

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if they lasted more than a month
customer_reviews.text: I loved these things. They were probably the best sounding bluetooth earbuds I ever had. The battery lasted what seemed like forever. Unfortunately, they only lasted 31 days. They simply stopped connecting to my phone today. Now they are completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Reliable battery lasts a whole day easily when ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Reliable battery lasts a whole day easily when playing podcasts. The sound quality is very good. The rubber pieces could be better. There is one issue I have- when connected to a PC and a phone the phone will cause some static noises in audio playback if it is nearby during when Jabra is playing through audio from PC.
customer_reviews.author: toms

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep in place
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds sound fine when they’re in my ears, but despite all the different sizes to chose from, they come out every few minutes. Also, the “necklace “ part that connects the earbuds and has the battery stays in place when I’m upright, but If I bend to the side or backward it can fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Will Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Left speaker stopped working in under a month.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for phone calls and to listen to podcasts. For $40, it initially seemed like a good deal. Product performance was fine, decent mic for calls, and sound quality was fine to use while mowing the lawn listening to a podcast. My use was very light, but in just about a month, the left earpiece stopped working. I guess you get what you pay for. I'm moving on to another device.
customer_reviews.author: scarjosh

customer_reviews.title: Sounds nice but headset is so heavy it slides off my neck, down my back.
customer_reviews.text: I love the noise canceling properties of the headphones. Both calls and music sound great. I am using the largest sized earbuds and they constantly fall out of my ear, mainly because the actual headset is heaviest in the very back so it slides off my neck, down my back and pulls the earbuds out. I usually wear blouses with no collars so there is nothing for me to tuck the headset beneath. Other times it slides around my neck to one side or the other. I wish this headset was lighter so it would stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Tikanique

customer_reviews.title: Damaged very fast
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth work good and the Sound is the best but did not last very time. I bought The head set was New and it was Damage in a few time and the Second was used and too it was Damage in a few time.
customer_reviews.author: eugenio delgado rivera

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my expectations for how long electronics should work is the problem?
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March 2017, stopped powering on in January 2018. I loved it while it was working, but am worried to repurchase or to purchase the newer model. I expect my stuff, which I take good care of, to last longer. ++UPDATE++ Took two weeks and Jabra replaced my broken headset, under warranty, free of charge. Fairly painless process. I am not changing my review, until the new one makes it 12 months, but I appreciate the company doing the right thing. Thanks, Jabra!
customer_reviews.author: ben lewinger

customer_reviews.title: REPLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: This rating is for the MPOW Cheetah headset I was sent to replace the Halo. Cheetah works well for the last month. I work mowing on a golf course 5-7 hours a day and use headset every day. It works well so far. My only concern is that there would be a pair of more comfortable foam ear buds instead of the silicon that is standard. If there were foam ear buds I would rate headset at least 4.5 or maybe higher.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not a forever headset
customer_reviews.text: These worked out great for about 6 months. Then the microphone started acting up. People couldn't hear me and I couldn't hear them. They still work for just listening to music, but if a call comes in, you'll be scrambling to remove them and turn off your bluetooth. Other than these issues, the sound quality is great. I carry both a work phone and personal and it worked perfect for what I do. I was able to talk on one phone and take a call on the other when needed. I wish they still worked for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mic quality for calls, but falls off neck
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a Bluetooth headset with excellent phone call clarity (mic). This headset does this very very well. However, I had issues with it being too heavy on the back of my neck and falling off. Was unable to use it unless sitting still. Would work great for conference calls sitting at a desk, but not as reliable when moving around.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Best headset in years.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headset I'd recommend this and should be included, with the unit. Jabra Rox Eargel Pack Eargels Black  This product has great battery life and clarity. The mentioned accessory should be part of the product. The hooks make an excellent fit. It hooks inside the ear the concept can be reused with other earphones. I usually float between 3 - 4 headset/phones based on need but this is now my primary headset. Buy 2 kits it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith C.

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality is better than what I expected for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I need a Bluetooth device with a mic. When listening to music, the sound quality is better than what I expected for the price I paid. However, the sound quality while I speak into the microphone leaves a lot to be desired for. I'm debating returning this item
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE F DELEERSNYDER

customer_reviews.title: Back to the drawing board
customer_reviews.text: This product was a big disappointment. The description made it sound great with a 17 hr battery life but does not tell you how it will have a horrible bluetooth connection. The first day it was working fine but then the connection started to fail by the second day. My phone was in my pocket, so it wasn't more than 2 feet away. Not only was I losing connection but my phone calls were being dropped as well and some how it started making calls on its own. I haven't had it for more than 4 days and I'm returning it. The potential was there but the quality was not.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ramos

customer_reviews.title: The volume level is very poor with this product
customer_reviews.text: The volume level is very poor with this product. I am so glad I only paid $25 for this product because it is definitely not worth its original price tag at all not even close. I am going to keep this as a back up but I am definitely in the market for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Work as they should.
customer_reviews.text: Finally broke down and bought something like this. I use my cellphone for work and find those super long calls agonizing without being hands free. These work great, except that the right ear bud always slips out of my ear. I don't know how to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: CrabbyChic70

customer_reviews.title: A problem with Jabra Halo Smart
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Jabra Halo Smart in November, 2016 here at Amazon.com. I could use it around a month after I faced a problem. The headset doesn’t switch on after charging. Moreover, the red LED is always on when charging. It doesn’t change into green after 1,5-2 hours of charging. I tried resetting the headset in accordance with the manual but ineffectively. Dissapointed with such problem occured. Sending it for replacement will most probably cost me a lot. Don't know what to do...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months calls are badly distorted, I can use it for calls. 11 days past return window.
customer_reviews.text: You know it had a lot of good things said about it and it bought it. It worked great sounded good and now that I am 11 days past my return window my phone calls are getting distorted and tinny sounding, I can barely hear the caller due to massive distortion. It connects good but that's about the only thing I can say about it. I wouldn't buy it again if I knew this. Wasted my money. They are so bad after 2 plus months I can't use them anymore. Buy sit something else.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Good sound- bad quality - lost respect for Jabra
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a year ago. Worked fine for the first 9 months. Then they fell apart. Sound stopped in one of the earbuds, clarity /noise cancelling stopped (callers couldn’t hear me well, cut in and out), this past month it begin to stop playing my music (Spotify; Pandora, Music on my devices). Good sound, but if they don’t work It doesn’t matter the quality of sound. Very disappointed in Jabra. I lost respect for Jabra brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E Green

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good head phones
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good head phones. I do have a slight struggle with one side falling out of my ear (I have tried all size ear buds included), but other than that, I like them. The sound quality is good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: I love it For 30 bucks only
customer_reviews.text: I love it For 30 bucks only, you get an superb battery life. I listen to poscasts alot and I recharge it once every 5 days. The calling quality is great. The mic is concealed in the tip making it wind resistant. No one has ever complained from a poor quality voice from my side. The sound quality for music is acceptable for the price, the bass is low but very clear and no distortion when voulme is 100%. It is pretty loud too as the insulation is decent. Build quality could have been better. Yet is is very light and tangle free.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar Saadalla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect features, but terrible durability.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect until it breaks. I'm on my second pair since my initial order approximately 8 months ago (luckily their warranty program is easy), and am already experiencing the breakdown of the second unit. Pros: Multipoint Call Quality Comfort Battery Life Cons: Durability
customer_reviews.author: M. Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound For commuting
customer_reviews.text: Nice headset with lots of features. Paid $30 bucks which i believe is decent, Sounds good too. I will be trying the mic with a phone call later. I just hope it lasts long, other no name brands only lasted few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: The headset worked great for the first 6 months and then it started ...
customer_reviews.text: The headset worked great for the first 6 months and then it started randomly dropping calls. The frequency of failure actually made it unusable after 6 months. Pretty disappointed given the high reviews. I will contact Amazon to see what options are available to replace this headset as I think 6 months is far too short a life. I'll update this review based on how Amazon replies to addresses the issue.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Average At Best
customer_reviews.text: This headset is pretty good, but I can’t say it’s the best choice. I sometimes have issues with it disconnecting from my phone and I have to make sure that I select my headset when I answer my iPhone. The earbuds don’t always stay together even though they are magnetized. Every now and then I get some feedback when talking on the phone. They’re a cheaper choice and they work ok, but I wish I would’ve spent a little more and got a better headset.
customer_reviews.author: Nikeya S. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: The price says it all. Won't keep a charge ...
customer_reviews.text: The price says it all. Won't keep a charge (advertises 16 hours, but I've never gotten more than 4). The earbuds don't stay in your ear, even when I used the largest size, they still fall out when I turn my head.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Vail

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth stopped connecting after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sound, comfort and especially the battery life. After 3 months it would no longer hold bluetooth connection, it will disconnect with any head movement. Disappointing, I thought I had found THE ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay in your ears
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not bad. However, the earplugs will simply not stay in your ears, even without any activity. I tried all of the sizes and could not get any of them to stay. Very frustrating, so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: these are easily the best
customer_reviews.text: After trying many different Bluetooth headsets from different manufacturers, these are easily the best. From full spectrum sound (including good bass) and incredible battery life, these should be your only choice for a headset. The earbuds do a great job of blocking out ambient noise, which is perfect for phone conversations, and the microphones also cancel out wind noise. On my second pair because I lost the first one, wouldn’t even consider another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to set this up and use for the first time and wow - it was so easy! All i had to do is turn the headset on and turn on the Bluetooth on my phone and voila connected. The sound on calls is wonderful and my callers had no problem hearing me or any distortion even though I as driving , which is why I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: The headset is good with ok audio quality, i have bought 2 sets and both always brake at the power and audio controller,they only last a couple months at most,i have the last set laying around useless cause one side doesn't work anymore,i like everything about it but the quality is very bad
customer_reviews.author: Juan Contreras

customer_reviews.title: The headphones are broken
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very nice, however my unique complain is that they came broken in the silvered side (see attachment). That’s the “surprise surprise” I’ve got when unboxing them :-/
customer_reviews.author: Milton Eduardo Ruiz Cid

customer_reviews.title: i use these constantly from the gym, busty mostly ...
customer_reviews.text: i use these constantly from the gym , busty mostly for work out doors and I rely on it a ton , would buy again
customer_reviews.author: rubondo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I work construction and use these so I dont miss calls. The vibrating neck band does vibrate hard enough for me to feel when I have a call coming in. Other then that they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Cage

customer_reviews.title: Quality item, works very well...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well... the magnetized earbuds hold together reasonably well, but the best part is that it is easy to pair, has great sound for both me and the person on the other end, is convenient to wear around the house, and seems to have good range with my iPhone... Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: knb53

customer_reviews.title: Its ok for starter wireless head sets.
customer_reviews.text: Its great. The sound ia not some thing to brag about. But the noise cancellation is good. It serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Castillo Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Sad Jabra Bluetooth in imagine how it feels you start phone call suddenly phone call got disconnected because a stupid feature from your Bluetooth if the magnet touches to Bluetooth headset it's got disconnected the call that's STUPID also it have vary small working range if you're more than 20 ft. From the phone you're unable to hear anything NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life - poor fit with all headphone adapters
customer_reviews.text: Buying "aftermarket" ear buds for this set is a must for most adults. They are all way to small.
customer_reviews.author: ida

customer_reviews.title: No of the others came close to a better all around value and sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought Plantronics, The LG, Klipsch and Sol Republic. No of the others came close to a better all around value and sound. Save yourself time . Go with the Jabra Halo Smart! 10+
customer_reviews.author: frankster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for phone calls
customer_reviews.text: The headset is light, comfortable, connects easily and reliably. My only "complaint" is the battery lasts so long that I forget to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is pretty good and comfortable hardware design with no hanging volume ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is pretty good and comfortable hardware design with no hanging volume buttons under earlobe like other Wireless Bluetooth earbuds. Impressive customer care service from amazon. The volume down button is not working properly for my first order and Amazon immediately sent me a replacement one when I report to them. Update: However, i bought another 3 sets for friends
customer_reviews.author: Ye

customer_reviews.title: Battery and sound quality for you!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a headset with superb battery life and quality sound then look no further. One charge for a whole day and then some. The ear cushions could use replacing with something of better quality but there's no sacrifice to sound quality none.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it's been used
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this has been used even though I purchased it new. The bags that hold the accessories are empty. The charging cord is unwrapped. Two different size rubber buds are on the ear pieces. And, it does not provide any connecting directions when I try to connect to bluetooth, even though that's what is clearly stated in the directions. It isn't visible to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The headset is fine but ultimately my biggest concern with choosing one of ...
customer_reviews.text: One ear bud stopped working after 6mos. The headset is fine but ultimately my biggest concern with choosing one of the 100 different brands was whether or not it would actually last. Well this one didn't. It's clearly a wiring issue cause if I tug on one side or the other I can get the left ear to come in and out but it's never for long.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua L Whiteley

customer_reviews.title: Wont Last Long.
customer_reviews.text: My second pair just broke. Each lasted less than 6 months. In both cases, they stopped powering on.with no signs of external damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Looks breat very comfortable But you have to pair it every time you ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks breat very comfortable But you have to pair it every time you switch devices so annoying the sound is not bad music sounds good not very loud
customer_reviews.author: Mr.E

customer_reviews.title: Indeed THE BEST EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its been over a month now and Thank God i didnt hesitate to try this earphone bcoz for me i'd just found the WIRELESS EARPHONE of my life!!. Everything of her company details was so TRUE. So you MR. MS. MRS. reading this review pls give this amazing headphone a shot to you, I promise you won't regret it😊 just ADD him to your cart now!. Thank you JABRA well done😉.
customer_reviews.author: jthan

customer_reviews.title: Want turn back on/disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Since 10-15-2020 they stop working, they would charge up with the green light saying there fully charged,but they want turn on even tried resetting methods from jabra website This is my second pair the first ones lasted 7 yrs and was great,not sure what to Do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The app from the google play makes it easier to check battery level with with forecast for next recharge based on useage. The fits perfectly in my ears, the text to speech from the app is great helps to keep one updated.
customer_reviews.author: Baba Mai Wudiri

customer_reviews.title: happy to have good voice quality on a bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: Overall, happy to have good voice quality on a bluetooth headset. Doesn't work well with two devices at once (really tedious to un-connect and reconnect). However, really great if I just use it for my iPhone alone! It stays well in my ears when I'm walking, although I wouldn't recommend it for any higher-intensity activity/sport.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: To make the sound better and clearer
customer_reviews.text: The sound is grood but the headset make a noise in them when in use that sound Scratching.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fit
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and fit, but 2 stars because after less than a year of use in the gym the charging port corroded to a point where the device no longer charges. Unacceptable if you ask me. I assume it was from sweat, but still.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Waychoff IV

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound quality & noise cancel though & good battery ...
customer_reviews.text: ONLY pairs with cell phone, not desktop/not all laptops. GREAT sound quality & noise cancel though & good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Taya M.

customer_reviews.title: Work well and hold a charge for a very long time
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds work great and they hold a charge forever (I've used them for about ten hours now and they are still about half way charged). I don't like the way the rigid part sits around your neck. It is always sliding off or shifting, so that would lower my reading a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Waxman

customer_reviews.title: ONLY LASTED ME 5 WEEKS...
customer_reviews.text: after 5 weeks the haedset started pausing and ending calls on it's own when i move my head to the right ... i stopped using them, i looked on jabra's website for warranty or service and they said i had to deal with the seller. i really liked everything about the headset very comfortable to wear and the sound wasn't too bad until they started messing up, this is my second bad experience with a jabra product so no more jabra for me . I do get very sweaty, that might've been what messed them up :(
customer_reviews.author: Victor H C

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Volume is OK. EarPods are a bit loose. Other than that, I'm happy with the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is really good!
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life! Keeps me going all day long! Lays perfectly on the neck. Maybe the magnet should be a little bit stronger, many times it wont hold together. The sound quality is really good!
customer_reviews.author: Oszkar Karai

customer_reviews.title: The earbuds can fall out though in just a normal office setting by turning your head like from one monitor to another
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it works well especially when exercising. The earbuds can fall out though in just a normal office setting by turning your head like from one monitor to another. They also have a tendancy to slide off the back when in an office setting which is strange because when running they stay put. Sound and voice quality is acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Neyman

customer_reviews.title: Great for a short period of time.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 2 months ago. I am outside of the return period and the headset was working nicely until last week. Then the headset just started crackling in the middle of calls. And now its all crackle. I am sitting indoors, at a desk with no wind and it sounds like I am on top of a mountain. I am not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A Greer

customer_reviews.title: Crap - will fail just after your return time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and it worked good for about two months - just long enough for me to not be able to return them or make a claim on them anymore. Now stuck with these crappy headphones that don't work!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Eickholt

customer_reviews.title: it broke in a really wear part, inside the control area (right side)
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months it broke in a really wear part, inside the control area (right side), if I move my neck it could end the call :( or lose the audio in my left speaker. I am sure I keep it under well store conditions and manipulation, if you are looking for something that works for more than a few months I don't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jose Chanto

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but for a minor issue
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the quality of the product, it’s pretty sturdy and the sound is clear (especially when I’m on the phone). My only issue is the earbuds keep falling out of my ears and the part that goes around your neck doesn’t stay put, it moves, and then eventually falls off my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Stoner-Mariona

customer_reviews.title: These headphones have ridiculous battery life. I charge them ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have ridiculous battery life. I charge them once a week and use them almost 4 hours a day!
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Quality voice and reliable headset
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Jabra products in the past. They are built well, priced well, and are very durable. My headset is mainly used for work. It is not water proof, and I do not recommend for it to be used at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Hombre

customer_reviews.title: Good product, battery last quite a while and only ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, battery last quite a while and only needed to be charged twice a week or so. Biggest problem is the ear tips keep falling out, and I have had to buy many replacements for them. Another problem which I have been having is every now and then the music will cut out, its only a small problem but kinda annoying. All in all these wireless headphones are good.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with a PC
customer_reviews.text: Works good with iOS, but i couldn't find a way to pair it with my Win 10 PC.I tried with both my work and personal PC. I sent a couple of e- mails to Jabra Support, and they never came back to me. I never was able to read that this headset is optimazed for iOS or Androind, but hardly with a PC
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto R Ahedo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife's birthday so that she can talk and drive hands free. She loves it. Works great. Had for 5 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Jabra Halo Smart. The sound quality is great and I love the 17 hour battery life! It's very to easy to pair with your phone! The only downside is that my neck is a little too big. However, I'm still about to wear it, it's just not as comfortable as I imagine it would be if my neck were smaller. I would still buy it as it has so many great features! I also love the magnets to keep the ear buds in place when not in use! This is a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Constantly disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a lemon. I've had this almost a year and have not been able to use this without it disconnecting. Very frustrating. Have tried using on two HTC phones, a Motorola phone, and Dell computer. Will connect and are able to listen but will eventually drop the connection. Doesn't seem to be any firmware updates, have tried re-pairing, nothing seems to work. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: John Steele

customer_reviews.title: Not working after less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality when listening to music or watching movies. Terrible sound on phone calls. Left ear bud quit working a month ago. Now the right one quit
customer_reviews.author: trkdrvr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound for the price, very long battery life, good range for bluetooth, good wind noise cancelation when talking on phone. One flaw is that it doesnt always stay in the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Stay hands free and keep the music rocking!
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds provide great quality sound and are totally comfy! I love that they have a 17 hour battery life, since I never remember to charge things. The one-year warranty is awesome! Overall a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: LSUKID

customer_reviews.title: this by far is the best. It last an insane amount of time
customer_reviews.text: I've been through several headsets, this by far is the best. It last an insane amount of time. I've honestly been trying to find something better but cant. My wife has had 0 issues with her set. I work outside, in the rain, snow, ect. so ive been through 2 already. The left ear seems to go out. I would suggest a protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Great device do use all day.
customer_reviews.text: I have two phones, Android and iPhone. I can connect at the same time, use to calls and music without problems. I'm looking for pair it with soft phone in notebook to create more mobility in my office. It have a nice sound. I just don't like to run with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Had the Jabra Smart Halo for about 3 months and then it died! Caused phone to drop calls and eventually stopped charging. I bought it because of the Jabra name and thought it was a good brand, I was wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds are not up to mark.
customer_reviews.text: Using it from more than a year and its so good. Excellent battery life. Ear buds are really weird and slipps off. I replaced them with other ones i had. Aprt from this everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: Gopichand

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: If you're buying this headset for exercising, this is not for you. The earpads fall very easily. I use them with my laptop and the sound is very good. The controls are kind of awkward to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dulos69

customer_reviews.title: It’s a worse Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I buy this item and it’s stopped working I call the company but no response
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor build quality for hiw expensive this is. This is not what I would expect from Jabra. The left side stopped working within two months.
customer_reviews.author: TK

product_meta.title: Jabra 100-98300000-02 Halo Smart Wireless Bluetooth Headset, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackJabra Halo smart wireless earbuds provide an industry leading talk time of 17 hours and outstanding sound quality for clear calls and full spectrum music. It's flexible Neckband design and IP54 Rated water resistance provides all day comfort that can be used for workouts or wherever your day takes you. To optimize your time, it features a voice button that will instantly connect to sir or Google now, allowing you to quickly get the information you need on-the-go. Designed by Jabra comfort experts, Halo smart has bendable Flex zones that allow you to shape the Neckband and ensure maximum comfort for long term use
feature_bullets: 10 millimeter speakers deliver exceptional, full spectrum audio
Wind noise reduction, noise cancellation and water resistant IP54 rating
Magnets in earbuds to hold together or onto neckband for a tangle free experience
Bendable Flex zones built into the neckband provide comfortable and secure fit
Industry leading 17 hrs. Talk time / 15 hrs. Music playback,Bluetooth Version: 4.0,Talk range: up to 10 meters (33 feet)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars1,001 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Headset, Eargels, USB charging cable, quick start guide
